post:
Hello,

I've got this vps from QualityServers, but I don't have currently any usage for it.
Is anybody interested in taking over the following vps:

http://www.lowendbox.com/blog/qualityservers-15year-128mb-openvz-vps-in-uk/

* 128MB memory/128MB VSwap
* 10GB storage on RAID50
* 200GB/month data transfer on 1Gbps
* 1x IPv4 + 8x IPv6
* OpenVZ/SolusVM


The contract expires on Aug 11th 2012, which means there are more than 10 months left.
I would give it away for £10.
